featured.text: With the completion of several public ______ projects, such as the MRT, commuting to work has become easier for people living in the suburbs.
Exciting or challenging events __(39)__ the birth of a child, completion of a major project at work, or moving to a new city generate __(40)__ much stress as does tragedy or disaster.

definition.zh_def: 完成，結束或達成某事的過程或狀態。
definition.en_def: The process or state of finishing or achieving something.
definition.example: The completion of the project was celebrated by the entire team.
